title: Community Proposal to Adjust the Output of MFS
body:
Background
MFS is a currency for MetaFinance eco-equity shares that can be used to exchange rewards in the strategy pool or for investment opportunities in eco-partnerships. In order to further enhance the value of MFS and promote the ecological interaction of mfi-MFS, the community initiated a proposal to adjust the MFS mineral pool.

Proposal
Adjust the output of the ETH chain MFS pit from the current coefficient to 1 month cycle, day 0.5% , 2 month cycle, day 1% , 3 month cycle, day 1.5% , 4 month cycle, day 2% , 5 month cycle, day 2.5% .
New MFS ecological planning: the rest of the output will be rolled out with the MFS cross-chain scheme

Execution item
The changes will take effect at 0:00 UTC on May 14,2021

Voting options
A. Approve
B. Oppose



关于调整MFS矿池产量的社区提案

背景
MFS是MetaFinance生态权益股份代币，用来兑换策略池中收益奖励，或换取生态外合作项目的投资机会。为了进一步提升MFS价值，促进MFI-MFS生态互动，社区发起调整MFS矿池的提案。

提案
调整ETH链MFS矿池产出，由目前的系数调整为1个月周期，日0.5%，2个月周期，日1%，3个月周期，日1.5%，4个月周期，日2%，5个月周期，日2.5%。
MFS生态新规划：产量剩余部分将随MFS跨链方案一并推出

执行项
根据提案投票结果作出修改，生效时间为 2021 年 5 月 14 日 0:00 UTC

投票选项
A. 支持上述提案
B. 反对上述提案
author: 0x48f357b08AbeC475C0268810AE70902b104782Fe
